LanguageData.TynanCustomAdulthood.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was an independent game developer.\n\nAfter an early success, [PAWN_possessive] career quickly degenerated into a circus of misguided ideas, deals gone wrong, and desperate, failed PR stunts.
LanguageData.TynanCustomAdulthood.title: game developer
LanguageData.TynanCustomChildhood.description: [PAWN_nameDef] spent his childhood selling knockoff cigarettes to 15-year-olds. The cigarettes were often full of grass clippings.
LanguageData.TynanCustomChildhood.title: punk
